text: Isirayila kaane birin, a fonne nun e kuntigine nun e kitisane birin xɔɲɛn nun dugurenne, ne birin yi ti kankiraan fɔxɔ firinni e yɛɛ rafindixi Lewi bɔnsɔnna saraxaraline ma, naxanye yi Alatalaa Layiri Kankiraan maxalima. Yamaan fɔxɔ kedenna yi siga Garisimi geyaan fari, a bode fɔxɔn fan yi ti Ebali geyaan fari, alo Alatalaa walikɛɛn Musa bata yi a yamari e ma kii naxan yi, fa fala e xa duba Isirayila yamaan xa.
